verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>speaks<s%> to <S%H1004>you,<s%> house of <S%H3478>Israel!<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H3925>"Don't<s%> learn the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H2865>don't<s%> be dismayed at the <S%H226>signs<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky;<s%> for the <S%H1471>nations<s%> are <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> at <S%H1992>them.<s%>

For the <S%H2708>customs<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> are <S%H1892>vanity;<s%> for one <S%H3772>cuts<s%> a <S%H6086>tree<s%> out of the <S%H3293>forest,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H2796>workman<s%> with the <S%H4621>axe.<s%>
They <S%H3302>deck<s%> it with <S%H3701>silver<s%> and with <S%H2091>gold;<s%> they <S%H2388>fasten<s%> it with <S%H4548>nails<s%> and with <S%H4717>hammers,<s%> that it not <S%H6328>move.<s%>

They are <S%H4749>like<s%> a palm <S%H8560>tree,<s%> of turned <S%H1696>work,<s%> and don't speak: they <S%H5375>must<s%> be <S%H5375>carried,<s%> because they <S%H6805>can't<s%> go. <S%H3372>Don't<s%> be afraid of <S%H7489>them;<s%> for they can't do evil, neither is it in them to do <S%H3190>good.<s%>"
There is none like <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh; you are <S%H1419>great,<s%> and your <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> in <S%H1369>might.<s%>

Who should not <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H4428>you,<s%> King of the <S%H1471>nations?<s%> For it <S%H2969>appertains<s%> to <S%H2450>you;<s%> because among all the wise men of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and in all their royal <S%H4438>estate,<s%> there is none like you.
But they are <S%H259>together<s%> <S%H1197>brutish<s%> and <S%H3688>foolish:<s%> the <S%H4148>instruction<s%> of <S%H6086>idols!<s%> it is but a <S%H6086>stock.<s%>

There is <S%H3701>silver<s%> beaten into <S%H7554>plates,<s%> which is <S%H935>brought<s%> from <S%H8659>Tarshish,<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%> from <S%H210>Uphaz,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H2796>artificer<s%> and of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H6884>goldsmith;<s%> <S%H8504>blue<s%> and <S%H713>purple<s%> for their <S%H3830>clothing;<s%> they are all the <S%H4639>work<s%> of skillful <S%H2450>men.<s%>

But <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is the <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H430>God;<s%> he is the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H4428>King:<s%> at his <S%H7110>wrath<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7493>trembles,<s%> and the <S%H1471>nations<s%> are not able to <S%H3557>withstand<s%> his <S%H2195>indignation.<s%>

<S%H1836>You<s%> shall <S%H560>say<s%> this to <S%H426>them:<s%> The gods that have <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H5648>made<s%> the <S%H8065>heavens<s%> and the <S%H778>earth,<s%> these shall <S%H7>perish<s%> from the <S%H772>earth,<s%> and from <S%H8460>under<s%> <S%H429>the<s%> <S%H8065>heavens.<s%>

He has <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> by his <S%H3581>power,<s%> he has <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> by his <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and by his <S%H2451>understanding<s%> has he stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens:<s%>

when he <S%H5414>utters<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> there is a <S%H1995>tumult<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and he causes the <S%H5387>vapors<s%> to <S%H5927>ascend<s%> from the <S%H7097>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> he <S%H6213>makes<s%> <S%H1300>lightnings<s%> for the <S%H4306>rain,<s%> and brings <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> out of his <S%H214>treasuries.<s%>

Every <S%H120>man<s%> has become <S%H1197>brutish<s%> and without <S%H1847>knowledge;<s%> every <S%H6884>goldsmith<s%> is <S%H3001>disappointed<s%> by his engraved <S%H6459>image;<s%> for his molten <S%H5262>image<s%> is <S%H8267>falsehood,<s%> and there is no breath in <S%H7307>them.<s%>
They are <S%H1892>vanity,<s%> a <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H8595>delusion:<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H6486>visitation<s%> they shall <S%H6>perish.<s%>

The <S%H2506>portion<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is not like <S%H3335>these;<s%> for he is the former of all <S%H3478>things;<s%> and Israel is the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of his <S%H5159>inheritance:<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> is his <S%H8034>name.<s%>
Gather <S%H622>up<s%> your <S%H3666>wares<s%> out of the <S%H776>land,<s%> you who <S%H3427>live<s%> under <S%H4692>siege.<s%>

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H7049>Behold,<s%> I will sling out the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> at this <S%H6471>time,<s%> and will <S%H6887>distress<s%> <S%H4672>them,<s%> that they may feel it.

<S%H188>Woe<s%> is me because of my <S%H7667>hurt!<s%> my <S%H4347>wound<s%> is <S%H2470>grievous:<s%> but I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H389>Truly<s%> this is my <S%H2483>grief,<s%> and I must bear <S%H5375>it.<s%>

My <S%H168>tent<s%> is <S%H7703>destroyed,<s%> and all my <S%H4340>cords<s%> are <S%H5423>broken:<s%> my <S%H1121>children<s%> are gone <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H5186>me,<s%> and they are no more: there is none to spread my <S%H168>tent<s%> any <S%H6965>more,<s%> and to set up my <S%H3407>curtains.<s%>

For the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> are become <S%H1197>brutish,<s%> and have not <S%H1875>inquired<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> therefore they have not <S%H7919>prospered,<s%> and all their <S%H4830>flocks<s%> are <S%H6327>scattered.<s%>

The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8052>news,<s%> <S%H935>behold,<s%> it comes, and a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7494>commotion<s%> out of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H776>country,<s%> to <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> a <S%H4583>dwelling<s%> place of <S%H8577>jackals.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> is not in <S%H376>himself:<s%> it is not in man who <S%H1980>walks<s%> to <S%H3559>direct<s%> his <S%H6806>steps.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H3256>correct<s%> <S%H4941>me,<s%> but in measure: not in your <S%H639>anger,<s%> lest you bring me to <S%H4591>nothing.<s%>

Pour <S%H8210>out<s%> your <S%H2534>wrath<s%> on the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H3045>don't<s%> know <S%H4940>you,<s%> and on the families that <S%H7121>don't<s%> call on your <S%H8034>name:<s%> for they have <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H398>yes,<s%> they have devoured him and <S%H3615>consumed<s%> <S%H8074>him,<s%> and have laid waste his <S%H5116>habitation.<s%>
